tool_description: API showing some of the latest news about organic farming in Brazil.
name: Organic Live Brazil
title: Organic Live Brazil

api_list.name: Get all news
api_list.description: Get some of the latest news about organic farming in Brazil.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://organic-live-brazil.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "organic-live-brazil.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://organic-live-brazil.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "organic-live-brazil.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
